# HKHeartbeatSeriesSample

**Class**

A sample that represents a series of heartbeats.

## Declaration

```swift
class HKHeartbeatSeriesSample
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartbeatSeriesQuery] to access the underlying heartbeat data.

The [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartbeatSeriesSample] class is a subclass of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSeriesSample] class. These samples are immutable; you set the sample’s properties when you build them, and they can’t change.

### Extend Heartbeat Samples

Like many HealthKit classes, you shouldn’t subclass the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartbeatSeriesSample] class. You may extend this class by adding metadata with custom keys to save related data used by your app.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartbeatSeriesBuilder/addMetadata(_:completion:)].

## Metadata

- **HKMetadataKeyAlgorithmVersion**: A key that indicates the version number of the algorithm used to calculate the sample’s value.

## Series data

- **HKQuantitySeriesSampleBuilder**: A builder object for incrementally building a sample that contains multiple quantities.
- **HKHeartbeatSeriesBuilder**: A builder object for incrementally building a heartbeat series.

## Inherits From

- HKSeriesSample

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
